summary: Website with home page (product search) and product management page (add/edit/delete products with name, photo, price). Gold and silver hexagonal background pattern.
architectural_notes: Two-page website structure: home page and product page
Product data includes name, photo, and price fields
Search limited to product names only

existing_features.title: Apply a gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the home page that covers the entire page background
Apply the same gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the product management admin page (AdminDashboard)

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with product name search functionality
Product management page with add/edit/delete form (name, photo, price)
Gold and silver hexagonal background pattern on both pages
